Hi, I'm Mengzhan (Jhan) Liufu!

I am an incoming PhD student at California Institute of Technology (Caltech).

I was a college student at the University of Chicago (UChicago). I got degrees in Computer Science, Physics and Economics. I was mentored by Professor Jai Yu, Professor Henry Hoffmann, Professor Bozhi Tian and other amazing scholars.

Here's my CV.

Academic interests

I am experienced with machine learning, neuromodulation algorithms and system neuroscience. I am particularly interested in the following topics:

  • Multimodal machine learning for healthcare
  • Self-supervised learning and few-shot learning
  • Interaction with the brain through AI-empowered implants and genetic modulation approaches
